channel.title: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!
channel.description:
This is my second Post and my second published graphic! :)
[IMG]http://i484.photobucket.com/albums/rr208/get_ston3d/HaloNess2.png[/img]
Thanks C&C please DON'T HATE! im new to this stuff

item.title: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

chrisn2323:

MY EYES, THEY BURN!!!1111

Matches the background.

Read full topic
item.source: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!

item.title: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:11, topic:245660”]Can you steal something with permission? I always thought stealing was an action which means that you gain someones physical/digital property without the owners permission. So stealing with permission would be the same as being silent while talking out loud.

Sorry for the bad metaphor, I couldn’t think of a better one.[/quote]
All I needed to make my day.

Read full topic
item.source: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!

item.title: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Can you steal something with permission? I always thought stealing was an action which means that you gain someones physical/digital property without the owners permission. So stealing with permission would be the same as being silent while talking out loud.

Sorry for the bad metaphor, I couldn’t think of a better one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:8, topic:245660”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=322119.msg2546407#msg2546407 date=1227317448]

The text is cool (if you made it yourself)

(he didn’t make it, but don’t tell anybody, it’s a secret)
[/quote]
Well, then 1/10[/quote]
generosity

item.title: Im back with another HALO GRAPHIC!
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Dude, you could have used more time on the cropping.

I especially noticed the big white dot by the rifle.
And around all of Master Chief…

The text is cool (if you made it yourself)

4/10

Work on your cropping if your gonna crop and paste

Read full topic
